title: Green Hell
notes:
Game shows an error when started saying that DirectX 11 is missing. After putting "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" to launch options game starts without the error. It is very playable, graphics renders without any glitches. 

The only problem I see is that the player's wristwatch's screen is black. That means you can see some vital information about the game. Played for a few hours without it and survived. :)

It plays without major issues after putting "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% " to the launch options. 

Only problem is the screen of the character's wristwatch does not render, it's black.
title: Green Hell
